topic.title: Plan Of Care Activity Act - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to Plan Of Care Activity

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode (CONF-487)
SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue (CONF-488)
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::INT or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::ARQ or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::PRMS or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::PRP or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::RQO
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF-486)

SHALL contain one or more sources of information (CONF-491)
UNIMPLEMENTABLE
SHALL conform to Plan Of Care Activity
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode, where its data type is x_ActClassDocumentEntryAct

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode (CONF-487)
SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue (CONF-488)
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::INT or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::ARQ or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::PRMS or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::PRP or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::RQO
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF-486)
Contains exactly one [1..1] code, where its data type is CD

SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue (CONF-488)
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::INT or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::ARQ or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::PRMS or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::PRP or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentActMood::RQO

SHALL contain one or more sources of information (CONF-491)
UNIMPLEMENTABLE
